member.name: IDirectManipulationDeferContactService.CancelContact
member.summary: Cancel all scheduled calls to SetContact for this pointerId.
member.returns: If the method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IDirectManipulationDeferContactService.CancelDeferral
member.summary: Cancel the deferral set in DeferContact and process the scheduled SetContact call for this pointerId.
member.returns: If the method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IDirectManipulationDeferContactService.DeferContact

summary.para: Specifies the amount of time to defer the execution of a call to SetContact for this pointerId.
DeferContact must be called before SetContact.

member.param: The duration of the deferral, in milliseconds. The maximum value is 500.
member.returns: If the method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Represents a service for managing associations between a contact and a viewport.

SetContact is called when a WM_POINTERDOWN message is received. Upon receiving a WM_POINTERDOWN, the application can use the coordinates of the input to hit-test and determine the viewports to which the contact is associated.
